comments:
I tried to create a servlet using the New Servlet wizard in M9 and the Finish button would never enable. I found the following exception in the .log:

I was unable to reproduce this, perhaps, the project was in a bad state?  At any rate, I added null guards to ensure it is protected in any case, so that should resolve the issue.

This will be in the 1130 WTP committed integration builds.
